core:processNote.core:description: This process is called to capture online PIN for contactless, magstripe and keyed card input only, not contact ICCs.
Provided to potentially disable PIN Bypass, if required, e.g. for Contactless UnionPay Debit. For now just allow it in any circumstance if enabled on the Card Type.

For the moment treating PIN Bypass with Contactless the same as MagStripe : we force Signature Verification.
Also for the moment not adjusting the TVR.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Cancel provides a way out of the remove card prompt if WaitForCardRemoval is specified but for some failure reason the reader will not report card removed.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Set PIN Bypassed and force Signature Required
